title: Economies of scale, LRATC falls with more output

content.question: If a firm's production process exhibits economies of scale, which of the following will occur when the firm's output increases?

choices.label: Its short-run average total costs will rise.
Its long-run average total costs will rise.
Its long-run average total costs will fall.
Its short-run average total costs will fall.
Its long-run total costs will fall.

content.answer: Its long-run average total costs will fall.

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model
